IRQZE.description: Generates interrupt@ when "1" is set to TCSA.IRQZF

ICRE.description: Generates interrupt when "1" is set to TCSA.ICLR

MSPC.description: Reads the current counter value from a Peak value detection mask counter

MSZC.description: Reads the current counter value from a Zero value detection mask counter

MSPI.description: Sets the number of masked Peak value detections

MSZI.description: Sets the number of masked Zero value detections

IOP1.description: Indicates that a match has already been detected between FRT's count value and OCCP(1) value at OCU ch.(1).

IOP0.description: Indicates that a match has already been detected between FRT's count value and OCCP(0) value at OCU ch.(0).

IOE1.description: Generates interrupt@ when "1" is set to OCSA.IOP1

IOE0.description: Generates interrupt@ when "1" is set to OCSA.IOP0

CST1.description: Enables the operation of OCU ch.(1)

CST0.description: Enables the operation of OCU ch.(0)

FM4.description: Selects FM4 mode for operating mode

CMOD.description: Selects OCU's operation mode in combination with OCSC.MOD0 to MOD5

OTD1.description: Indicates that the RT(1) output pin is in the High-level output state.

OTD0.description: Indicates that the RT(0) output pin is in the High-level output state.

OCSE1BUFE.description: Enable buffer register function of OCSE(1)

OCSE0BUFE.description: Enable buffer register function of OCSE(0)

OCCP1BUFE.description: Enable buffer register function of OCCP(1)

OCCP0BUFE.description: Enable buffer register function of OCCP(0)

MOD5.description: OCSC.MOD4 and OCSC.MOD5 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.4/ch.5 in combination with OCSB54.CMOD

MOD4.description: OCSC.MOD4 and OCSC.MOD5 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.4/ch.5 in combination with OCSB54.CMOD

MOD3.description: OCSC.MOD2 and OCSC.MOD3 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.2/ch.3 in combination with OCSB32.CMOD

MOD2.description: OCSC.MOD2 and OCSC.MOD3 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.2/ch.3 in combination with OCSB32.CMOD

MOD1.description: OCSC.MOD0 and OCSC.MOD1 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.0/ch.1 in combination with OCSB10.CMOD

MOD0.description: OCSC.MOD0 and OCSC.MOD1 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.0/ch.1 in combination with OCSB10.CMOD

OCSE.description: Specify the setting conditions of the OCU's matching detection register (IOP0)
Specify the setting conditions of the OCU's matching detection register (IOP0/IOP1)

FSO1.description: Connects FRT ch.x to OCU ch.1

FSO0.description: Connects FRT ch.x to OCU ch.0

DMOD.description: Specifies polarity for RTO(0) and RTO(1) signal outputs

PGEN.description: Specifies how to reflect the CH_PPG signal for each channel of the WFG

PSEL.description: Select the PPG timer unit to be used for each channel of the WFG

GTEN.description: Selects the output conditions for the CH_GATE output signal of the WFG

DCK.description: Set the count clock cycle for the WFG timer and Pulse counter

TMIS54.description: Stops the WFG54 reload timer and clears TMIF54

TMIE54.description: Starts WFG54 reload timer and checks the operation state of it

TMIF54.description: Detects the event of WFG54 reload timer interrupt occurrence

TMIS32.description: Stops the WFG32 reload timer and clears TMIF32

TMIE32.description: Starts WFG32 reload timer and checks the operation state of it

TMIF32.description: Detects the event of WFG32 reload timer interrupt occurrence

TMIS10.description: Stops the WFG10 reload timer and clears TMIF10

TMIE10.description: Starts WFG10 reload timer and checks the operation state of it

TMIF10.description: Detects the event of WFG10 reload timer interrupt occurrence

DTIFB.description: Detects DTTIX signal input via analog noise filter

DTIFA.description: Detects the event of DTTIX signal input via digital noise-canceller

WIM54.description: Selects whether a WFG54 reload timer interrupt is masked when the WFIR.TMIF54 flag is set

WIM32.description: Selects whether a WFG32 reload timer interrupt is masked when the WFIR.TMIF32 flag is set

WIM10.description: Selects whether a WFG10 reload timer interrupt is masked when the WFIR.TMIF10 flag is set

DIMB.description: Selects whether a DTIF interrupt is masked when the WFIR.TIFDTIFB flag is set

DIMA.description: Selects whether a DTIF interrupt is masked when the WFIR.DTIFA flag is set

DTIEB.description: Selects whether to set the WFIR.DTIFB flag for the path from the DTTIX pin for input signal to an analog noise filter

SDTI.description: Sets the WFIR.DTIFA register by writing to the register from the CPU

NWS.description: Set the noise-canceling width for a digital noise-canceller

DTIEA.description: Selects whether the WFIR.DTIFA register is set for the path via digital noise filter from the DTTIX input pin

FSI1.description: Connects FRT ch.x to ICU ch.(1)

FSI0.description: Connects FRT ch.x to ICU ch.(0)

ICP1.description: Indicates that a valid edge has been detected at ICU ch.(1) and the capture operation has been performed

ICP0.description: Indicates that a valid edge has been detected at ICU ch.(0) and the capture operation has been performed

ICE1.description: Generates interrupt@ when "1" is set to ICSA.ICP1.

ICE0.description: Generates interrupt@ when "1" is set to ICSA.ICP0.

EG1.description: Enables/disables the operation of ICU-ch.(1) and selects a valid edge(s)

EG0.description: Enables/disables the operation of ICU-ch.(0) and selects a valid edge(s)

IEI1.description: Indicates the latest valid edge of ICU ch.(1)

IEI0.description: Indicates the latest valid edge of ICU ch.(0)

FSA1.description: Specify the FRT to be connected to ADCMP ch.(1)

FSA0.description: Specify the FRT to be connected to ADCMP ch.(0)

ACMP.description: Specifies an AD conversion start time

SEL54.description: Selects compatible operation of ADCMP ch.5 and ch.4 with FM3 Family products

SEL32.description: Selects compatible operation of ADCMP ch.3 and ch.2 with FM3 Family products

SEL10.description: Selects compatible operation of ADCMP ch.1 and ch.0 with FM3 Family products

CE54.description: Enables/disables compatibility of ADCMP ch.5 and ch.4 with FM3 Family products

CE32.description: Enables/disables compatibility of ADCMP ch.3 and ch.2 with FM3 Family products

CE10.description: Enables/disables compatibility of ADCMP ch.1 and ch.0 with FM3 Family products

ADSEL.description: Specify the destinations of ADC start signals that are output by ADCMP

BUFE.description: Select enable/disable and transfer timing for buffer function of the ACMP register

ZE.description: Enables/disables the operation of the ADCMP when the FRT is "0x0000"

UE.description: Enables/disables the operation of the ADCMP that is counting up for the connected FRT

PE.description: Enables/disables the operation of the ADCMP that is counting down at the Peak value of the connected FRT

DE.description: Enables/disables the operation of the ADCMP that is counting down for the connected FRT

OCUS.description: Selects the OCU OCCP register that will become the start for offset start
